diff_hunk:
@@ -524,10 +524,12 @@ on your system: use the following command for CUDA Toolkit >= 8.0: 
-  sudo apt-get install cuda-command-line-tools
+  sudo apt-get install cuda-command-line-tools-8-0
-Add this path to the `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` environmental variable: +for Cuda 8.0, or cuda-command-line-tools-9-0 or 9-1 as appropriate for your cuda version.
body: Not that I know of - but many (like me) who hit this issue [16214](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16214) successfully resolve by using cuda-command-line-tools-9-0  or the like instead of cuda-command-line-tools.  Installing cuda-command-line-tools does seem to be unnecessary in the first place (if cuda8/9 has been installed properly) - so i will modify the pr accordingly .
